SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Green Building Certification Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Green Building Certification Rate is Eco-Friendly Product Sales Growth Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Green Building Certification Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Green Building Certification Rate is Sustainable Packaging Adoption Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Sustainable Packaging Adoption Rate, is the point for Porter, Craig and Martin Sustainability Initiative inside or outside the point for Mcfarland PLC Sustainability Initiative?
SRP.A: On the Sustainable Packaging Adoption Rate, the point for Porter, Craig and Martin Sustainability Initiative is outside the point for Mcfarland PLC Sustainability Initiative.

VPR.Q: On dimension Eco-Friendly Product Sales Growth Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Eco-Friendly Product Sales Growth Rate, label {Mcfarland PLC Sustainability Initiative} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Sustainable Packaging Adoption Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Sustainable Packaging Adoption Rate, label {Anthony Inc Sustainability Initiative} scores the lowest.
